::Vukodlak/Dachande/Battera::

    The "coffen" lid blew off the top, out c=
ame the mighty Vukodlak. He was quite impessive. He quickly made his way to=
 the surface. Once there he called his minions, well, minion.
    Battera l=
eft the safety of the bunker and flew off towards Vukodlak. Dachande turned=
 and saw her, and he followed. They both soon reached there. But Vukodlak h=
ad seen Dachande coming.
    A bolt of lighting from an otherwise clear sky=
 hit Dachande as he was running. He staggered back. Battera landed on the g=
round, transforming by Vukodlak's feet.
    "My pet. Welcome home," Vukodla=
k said. "Now, will you finish this pest?"
    Battera looked at him with wa=
rey eyes, but she went after Dachande anyway. She hit him with everything s=
he had. He stumbled again and again, but then shot her down with a blast fr=
om his shoulder cannon. Then he commed the Maximals. "I need a CR Chamber, =
get someone to help us here quickly."
    He also sent their cordinates. He=
 knew that one would die, and if he had his way, it would be this creature.=

    "Man, you made me hurt her," He said. Jumping up going for Vukodlak's =
face. "You suck."
    Vukodlak grabbed him and threw him to the ground. "Pi=
tyful."
    The battle was emense, the shots could be seen through out the =
area, any bot coming in would know that something was happening.
    Dachan=
de kept at Vukodlak with his shoulder cannon, eventully pulling out his han=
d held blaster, he threw disks at him, barely inflicting damage. Then Vukod=
lak seemed to fall.
    "Now you will face the true might of the voivodes!"=
 He said. Transforming into a beast mode of which the world had never seen.=

    Battera was now waking up from her shock. And Vukodlak's grip on her h=
ad been severed. She joined in the fight to kill this creature.
    Dachand=
e lost his spear to the creature and was flown across the area. He got back=
 up, his armor damaged beyond belief, he was foerced to go into beast mode.=
 Then running at the monster he jumped at it. The Voivode grabbed him and s=
hoved him into his mouth. He swolled Dachande whole, on his way down to dea=
th Dachande broke out of the mechanical throat and into the chest cavity. H=
e was cramped inside the beast but eventully found his Spark. Dachande sunk=
 his claws into the Spark and the Spark and the body went exploding. Batter=
a was thrown into a tree. Dachande was hurt much worse. the only thing that=
 was really attached to his torso was his head, and that was there just bar=
ely. He hoped the the Maximals would arrive soon with help.
